title: Persian 13
text: I fear lest, bereft of the melody of the dove of heaven, ye will sink back to the shades of utter loss, and, never having gazed upon the beauty of the rose, return to water and clay.
teaser: I fear lest, bereft of the melody...

prev.title: Persian 12
prev.text: Close one eye and open the other. Close one to the world and all that is therein, and open the other to the hallowed beauty of the Beloved.

next.title: Persian 14
next.text: Abandon not the everlasting beauty for a beauty that must die, and set not your affections on this mortal world of dust.
